actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize a program for the improvement and restoration of the Buffalo metropolitan area, New York.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to carry out a program of flood control, recreation, fish and wildlife, water quality, waste water management, environmental quality, and bank stabilization for the improvement and restoration of the Buffalo metropolitan area, New York.

titles.title: A bill to authorize a program for the improvement and restoration of the Buffalo metropolitan area, New York.
